nodes.text: The Blackscale "Hall Sweeper" carbine was a carbine weapon made specifically for use in the confined corridors of the Avatar Orbital Platform, by members of the Blackscale Clan.

Elements of real-world weapons have been incorporated into this design: the buttstock is taken from the German FG-42 (Model I) rifle, while the pistol grips appear to be taken from the MG-42 machine gun.
